name: Special Edition Card for nayra1316 - The Necromancer
description:
Don't you dare mess with Necromancer!

He has spells to revive dead souls. The resurrected souls become his army and can be used to attack his enemies. He has very strong powers, he can even control powerful monsters like Dragons and Hydra. But, he always used his powers wisely. He uses his powers to protect those around him because deep in his heart there is goodness. He has two companions in his journey, Paladin and Alchemist.
